tool.name: SAGA.statistics_points.0
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayFIELD False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.statistics_points.0 POINTS $POINTS FIELD $FIELD DISTCOUNT $DISTCOUNT DISTMAX $DISTMAX NSKIP $NSKIP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
